Posts.Content: Hi Hulahoops, I had right upper lung lobe removed due to a large tumour 4 years ago. Who knows what will happen ?? We all take one day at a time. Thats how I deal with it. No-one is brave, we are all scared, thats why we come back to this site for reassurance. Just take it one day at a time, live for the moment. Hugs, Xxxx
Posts.Title: What now ?
